title: Understanding Themes in Excel
text: Themes in Excel allow you to apply a consistent look and feel across your workbook. This includes colors, fonts, and effects.

title: Where to Find Themes
text: Themes can be found in the 'Page Layout' tab in Excel. This tab contains options for changing the overall appearance of your workbook.

hintAnswer: run Excel and create a blank workbook, then choose the theme to apply
title: Steps to Apply a Theme
text: To apply a theme, first open Excel and create a new workbook. Then, navigate to the 'Page Layout' tab and select a theme from the 'Themes' group.
choices: run Excel and create a blank workbook, then choose the theme to apply
run Excel and create a blank workbook, then manually change the themes
choose the theme before running Excel
